quote: No matter how crazed you get, no matter what pressures you're under, no matter who needs what by yesterday... Always remember: everything you do uses a portion of someone else's life.
quote_letters: NO MATTER HOW CRAZED YOU GET NO MATTER WHAT PRESSURES YOURE UNDER NO MATTER WHO NEEDS WHAT BY YESTERDAY ALWAYS REMEMBER EVERYTHING YOU DO USES A PORTION OF SOMEONE ELSES LIFE
